title: Elegant Five-Star Belarus Retreat in Heart of Minsk
description: Crowne Plaza Minsk, an IHG Hotel, towers over this historic city, showcasing sweeping skyline views. Savour sophisticated dining options at the onsite restaurants, visit the striking Museum of Great Patriotic War for an insight into the city's WWII history or take a soothing stroll along the Svislach river. Return to an elegant guest room for a good night's sleep or recharge at the lavish NOVA Shangri-la SPA and fitness centre.
